Articles.Content:
Greetings. My name is Baenlynn. I'm a Texture artist with a penchant for RPGs and a burning desire to see hard vacuum from up close before I die (preferably not immediately before ). I heard about KSP from another site, plenty of people playing it so I decided to check it out (if you recognise me give a wave).

The scale and scope of this game is truly epic, but I didn't expect my PC's first true spanking to come from an indie game .Would love to see some BDBs and shuttle-parts in use in a release soon, as well as the option to put satellites and stations in orbit.

Welcome to the Forums.

Happy Launching!

From CarolRawley, your #1 supplier of things that will crash, burn, and kill your brain.

Capt'n Skunky, you are seriously falling behind...

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

PS: I can't help it if you get up 5 hours before me. And stop using my line!
